title: Spoils of the Moon
description: Forty-seven of the two hundred and fifty Apollo 13 lunar rocks have been recovered.This is the story of the first lunar rocks to go missing, causing a mother to lose a husband in a war he shouldnâ€™t have been in, a son disenfranchised from his country, and a father racked with guilt from a disobeyed order.Greg and Jordi are brothers that bond on a harrowing, yet liberating journey, after discovering their world is a lie. They are driven to find the truth over two continents, unearth their real family history, and the theft of some lunar rocks, but is their journey a search for the truth or the whereabouts of the spoils of the moon.
author: Mark Shearman
